name: Business Region Göteborg AB
memberOrga: We are the regional equivalent to a trade and industry development agency, wholly owned by the City of Göteborg.
goal:
Business Region Göteborg AB is dedicated to strengthening and developing trade and industry in the Göteborg region.
We are a non-profit organization representing 13 member municipalities. Our goal is to contribute to sustainable economic growth, a high level of employment and a diversified economy.
interests: Culture, Energy, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
We follow H2020 and COSME very closely.
We are new memebers of DG Connect Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition.
Our EU Affairs Representative has acted as evaluator for COSME with expert ID CT-EX2015D240884-101.
We are members of the EBN Innovation network
